markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Nameless Anonymity](/Feats.aspx?ID=906) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 95 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Magic Warrior](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=19)

**Prerequisites**
[Magic Warrior Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=903)

</column>

---

Your mask protects you further from divination. Once per day, you can cast [_nondetection_](/Spells.aspx?ID=209) on yourself, heightened to the highest level of spell you can cast; the spell ends immediately if your mask is removed for even a moment. The spell is of the same tradition as your focus spells.
name: Nameless Anonymity
